backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FIX_NOTE.md: Notes describing a frontend deployment failure caused by environment variable usage in Vite.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rule routing all SPA paths to index.html.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown routes to index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router configuration mapping routes to pages within SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Portfol: Component showing site and portfolio URLs with copy‑to‑clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/branding/QRCodeB: Component rendering a QR code using an SVG built from a matrix.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Simple section header with title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social links using wood‑themed styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile menus, and social links using router navigation and a state-managed sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper that sets a dynamic wood background and renders the header, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaLight: Lightbox dialog for viewing gallery images or videos with close controls and item metadata.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaStrip: Category-based media grid with loading states, error handling, and optional layout variations for majlis items.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Service detail section displaying title, description, features, and a related MediaStrip with style variations.
frontend/src/content/branding.ts: Defines logo asset paths and company name branding constants.
frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts: Exports structured gallery item data for images and videos grouped by category.
frontend/src/content/qrMatrix.ts: Provides a static 2D matrix representing a QR code for the contact page.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service descriptions, features, and additional offerings used across service sections.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Contains site-wide text content including company details, vision, mission, slogans, and contact info.
frontend/src/content/socialLinks.ts: Stores external social media link URLs for use in components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, status, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, typography, and background effects.
frontend/src/lib/publicAsset.ts: Resolves asset URLs using Vite's BASE_URL to ensure correct paths across deployments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders company information, services, and a list of branding taglines.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact methods, location, and phone numbers using UI components.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a filterable media gallery with categories, lightbox support, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage layout with a hero section, navigation buttons, contact info, and a QR code block using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the services page, listing core services and additional offerings with optional media strips.
frontend/src/pages/VisionMissionPage.tsx: Displays the company’s vision and mission in two styled card sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, shadows, container settings, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Sets TypeScript options for Node-related builds, including module resolution and composite settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite setup with React, environment variable handling, aliases, dev server proxying, and build settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and background-image update goals for the redesign.
